source.7a3ac6b9: # COVID-19 Bangladesh Confirmed Cases and Fatalities Forecasting
source.19ce7727: **In this notebook, the model will be predicting the cumulative number of confirmed COVID19 cases in Bangladesh, as well as the number of resulting fatalities, for future dates. We understand this is a serious situation, and in no way want to trivialize the human impact this crisis is causing by predicting fatalities. Our goal is to provide better methods for estimates that can assist medical and governmental institutions to prepare and adjust as pandemics unfold. In this particular notebook Lasso regression algorithm with polynomial feature used.**
